attributes.action: The government needs to disclose evidence on the 22 billion black hole
attributes.additional_details: The government has an obligation to be honest with the public. . They need to justify and back up what they are saying about the public purse. . This is our money not the governments and we have a right to know with clarity on the current situation on this so called blackhole! Asking the government for full disclosure and proof of this with clear evidence and clarity. . We don't want a typical political response! We want clarity!
attributes.background: The government has been asked in parliament about this 22 billion blackhole and time and time again refused to release evidence information and clarity on this, The public has the right to know everything about the public finances with full proof evidence of this black hole

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700170
